column2: "Well, did you have more fun than you've ever had? I sure did. That felt so deliciously good."
"There's nothing wrong with a little clean fun, is there? Well, technically it's more like a lot of bloody killing, but same difference, right?"
"Ooh, sorry, sorry. Was that totally inappropriate? Hee hee hee! "
"It's so hard to be misunderstood. But shooting, tormenting, and killing hostiles is just so much fun. I can't help it!"
"Anyway, I hope we can team up on another massacre-packed killing spree again sometime! Okay then! Bye-bye!"
